synopsis.text:
Even after successfully stealing the legendary Magic Lamp, master thief Lupin finds himself in an unprecedented predicament. Instead of granting wishes, the lamp's fairy, Drew, steals Lupin's memories from 7 PM to 7 AM, leaving him clueless about his nightly escapades. Waking up in Singapore with no recollection of the previous night, Lupin is determined to retrieve the lamp and restore his memories.

However, Lupin is not the only one after the mysterious lamp. The relentless Colonel Garlic and the envious Fujiko are also in pursuit, adding to the challenges Lupin faces. With his memories being wiped clean every night and the persistent adversaries on his tail, can Lupin outsmart them all, reclaim the lamp, and regain his lost memories? The race against time and memory begins in this thrilling anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
